item.title: Alogic Debuts $2,000 32-Inch 6K Display With Touch Support
item.description: Alogic today announced a 6K display that supports touch-based input, with the company saying that it’s the world’s first 6K touchscreen that’s compatible with the Mac. The Clarity 6K Touch with Fold S
